char_info.char_desc: The Plant Whose Hair Never Stops Growing

t_scene_info.speaker: Sanae:
t_scene_info.dialogue: When I first saw this, I thought somebody had put me under a curse.

t_scene_info.speaker: Sanae:
t_scene_info.dialogue: It wasn't until I saw that Kanako and Suwako were both affected as well!

t_scene_info.speaker: Sanae:
t_scene_info.dialogue: Has practically everyone in Gensokyo been affected?
Yes. Everyone has changed form. Also, any hair ornaments you are used to wearing are affected.

t_scene_info.speaker: Sanae:
t_scene_info.dialogue: Is there someone who can remedy this?
You appear to be the Wind Priestess of the Moriya Shrine. You're simply out of luck.
You can't cut it as it will simply grow back.

t_scene_info.speaker: Sanae:
t_scene_info.dialogue: That's what I tried to do. It just grew back as you mentioned.

t_scene_info.speaker: Sanae:
t_scene_info.dialogue: I don't want the Moriya Shrine to have piles of cut hair.

t_scene_info.speaker: Mayu:
t_scene_info.dialogue: All women in Gensokyo now have floor-length hair that will never stop growing.

t_scene_info.speaker: Sanae:
t_scene_info.dialogue: This is a disaster. I look like a complete freak.

t_scene_info.speaker: Mayu:
t_scene_info.dialogue: Long-haired women aren't freaks.

t_scene_info.speaker: Sanae:
t_scene_info.dialogue: I have no doubt someone is to blame for this situation. My poor beautiful hair.

t_scene_info.speaker: Mayu:
t_scene_info.dialogue: Did you look beautiful before it began?

t_scene_info.speaker: Sanae:
t_scene_info.dialogue: Yes, but I demand a solution be found for this ugly problem.

t_scene_info.speaker: Sanae:
t_scene_info.dialogue: How can I bless or sanctify my people at my shrine like this?

t_scene_info.speaker: Mayu:
t_scene_info.dialogue: You're getting out of hand. You look fine.

t_scene_info.speaker: Sanae:
t_scene_info.dialogue: Look at yourself in a mirror. You're just a freak like me.

t_scene_info.speaker: Mayu:
t_scene_info.dialogue: I can now have a larger bun with this hair.

t_scene_info.speaker: Sanae:
t_scene_info.dialogue: I'm pleased that you're a happy girl looking like an alien from space. Let me see if I can make you bald!
